abstract: Amazon.com is signing authors directly, cutting publishers out of book deals altogether; move places Amazon squarely in competition with New York publishing houses that are also its most prominent suppliers.
snippet: Amazon.com, the online retailer, has long competed with bookstores; now it is starting to make deals with authors, bypassing the traditional publisher.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com, the online retailer, has long competed with bookstores; now it is starting to make deals with authors, bypassing the traditional publisher.

headline.main: Amazon Signs Up Authors, Writing Publishers Out of Deal
headline.print_headline: Amazon Signing Up Authors, Writing Publishers Out of Deal
headline.seo: Amazon Rewrites the Rules of Book Publishing
